wikipedia_page.main: Prof William Stuart Mcrae Craig FRSE FRCP FRCPE (19 July 1903 – 1975) was an English physician and medical author. He was a pioneer in the field of community and preventive paediatrics. He was author of the book Care of the Newly Born Infant.

response: * Prof William Stuart Mcrae Craig FRSE (1903–1975), medical author
